title: Avengers Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: John Wick Chapter 3  Parabellum
description: John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassins' guild.

title: Joker
description: In Gotham City mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck embarks on a downward spiral of social revolution and bloody crime.

title: Morbius
description: Biochemist Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease but inadvertently infects himself with vampirism.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen a boxer and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: SpiderMan No Way Home
description: Spider-Man seeks Doctor Strange's help to restore his secret identity but the spell tears open the multiverse.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime with the help of Lt. Gordon and DA Harvey Dent as the Joker wreaks havoc.

title: Thor Ragnarok
description: Thor must escape the alien planet Sakaar in time to save Asgard from Hela and the impending Ragnarok.
